Comment: A unique ID number for the Cost Type.
The default markup percentage for the type.
The default overhead percentage for the type.
A descriptive name for the type.
The General Ledger code for the Sales Account related to this type.
The General Ledger sub-account code for the Sales Account related to this type.
This field contains 'T' if the type's "Show on quote" option is ticked; otherwise 'F'.
A short (max. three characters) code for the type
The ID number of the Cost Group that this type belongs to.
The General Ledger code for the Purchasing Account related to this type.
The General Ledger sub-account code for the Purchasing Account related to this type.
This field contains 'T' if the type's "Consolidate" option is ticked; otherwise 'F'.
This field indicates what the group's "Copy from quote to:" option is set to. Will be one of:N = NoneC = CostsT = TimesheetP = Purchase
